Key Match Events: The Timberwolves trailed by 10 points in the fourth quarter before closing the game on a 17-4 run to secure the victory.
Edwards scored the go-ahead basket with a floating jump shot that put Minnesota on top 117-116 with 25.7 seconds to go.
Gobert added a pair of free throws with 10.1 seconds left to increase the lead to three.
Braun screamed in celebration and drove his shoulder into Gobert. The Timberwolves' big man took offense, grabbing Braun and shoving him away.
Both players received a technical foul after officials reviewed the play.
Post-Match Reflections: Denver played down the stretch without guard Jamal Murray, who left in the third quarter after colliding with Randle. Murray was placed in the concussion protocol, the Nuggets said.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The @Timberwolves pulled out a THRILLER at home on the legs of their new duo:
Denver stormed to a 25-3 run to grab a 112-102 lead with 4:17 remaining.
The run included a highlight-reel play by Braun, who leaped for a dunk over Gobert, the Timberwolves' 7-foot-1 center.
The Timberwolves opened a 16-point lead in the second quarter.
